===Adverb===
{{zh-adv}}

# [[absolutely]] (not)
#: {{zh-x|金錢 不 是 萬 能 的，但 沒 錢 是 萬萬 不 能 的。|Money can't do everything, but you '''certainly''' can't do everything without money.}}
#: {{zh-x|她 萬萬 沒 想到 她 的 阿姨 是 殺手。|She '''never''' suspected '''for a minute''' that her aunty was a killer.}}
#: {{zh-x|恐怕 搬家 是 萬萬 不行 的。|Unfortunately, moving is '''out of the question'''.}}

====Usage notes====
* This adverb is almost always followed by a negative expression.
